mapper.sql: patent_id, patent_batch, patent_case_num, patent_apply_num, patent_apply_time, patent_technical_contact, patent_apply_person, patent_create_person, patent_name, patent_sign, patent_status_id, patent_type, patent_inventor, patent_writer
mapper.insert: insert into patent (patent_batch, patent_case_num, patent_apply_num, patent_apply_time, patent_technical_contact, patent_apply_person, patent_create_person, patent_name, patent_sign, patent_status_id, patent_type, patent_inventor, patent_writer, patent_remarks) values (#{patentBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentCaseNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentApplyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{patentTechnicalContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentApplyPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentCreatePerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentSign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patentStatusId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentInventor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patentWriter,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{patentRemarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
